version_description:
• [NEW] Undo previous steps of operation now supported.
• [NEW] Split segment now supported.
• [NEW] Grab still image from video segment.
• [NEW] Hollow text is supported.
• Fixed to avoid segments overlapped in same track.
• Fixed no sound issue when the device in silent ringtone state.
• Popup pre-defined transitions list by one tap.
• Now you can re-activate the help tips for beginners.
• Bug fixes.

• [New] 4 languages added: German, Spanish, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
• Bug fixes

• Optimized memory comsumption to reduce app crashing.
• When recording voice, also play the video in the background.
• [New] Full screen preview supported.
• [New] 5 languages added: French, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Korean.
• Bug fixes.

• [New] Slow/fast motion (Adjust video speed from 0.25X to 4X) now supported.
• [New] Transition on Image/Text now has Ease In & Ease Out effects.
• [New] Change background color of your movie.
• [New] Export/import movie project to/from iTunes.
• Cancel compressing video picked from Camera Roll.
• Support opening media file from other apps.
• Add preview for videos in File Sharing.
• Add progress for Facebook uploading.
• Bug fixes.
Fixed the app crashing at startup after upgraded to Pro on some iOS 7 devices.

• [New] 1:1 square movie now supported.
• [New] Left and Right text alignment supported.
• [New] Install custom fonts into Cute CUT.
• [New] Add audio only from a video into your movie.
• Finer control of shadow placement.
• iOS8 compatibility.
• Save user habits for text and picture properties.
• Many small adjustments.
• Bug fixes.

• Improved iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 plus compatibility.
• Bug fixes.

• Improved memory management.
• Improved picture display quality.
• Fine tune for transparency, sound volume and text size.
• Added private option for YouTube uploading.
• 3 new music tracks and 4 new sound FX.
• Bug fixes.
• Fixed crashes on iOS 9.

• Improved iPhone 6s & iPhone 6s plus compatibility.
• Bug fixes.

• Improved iPhone 6s & iPhone 6s plus compatibility.
• Bug fixes.

• Improved iPhone 6s & iPhone 6s plus compatibility.
• Bug fixes.

• Adjust colors for video, picture and text. (Saturation, Brightness, Contrast, Temperature, Exposure, Hue and RGB color. And animatable.)
• Crop is supported on video, picture and text. (And animatable)
• More transition easing functions supported. (Circular, Back, Elastic, Bounce)
• 2 new transitions.
• Movable central point for rotating.
• Add border, shadow, round corner to video.
• Arbitrary tracks order. (Now you can put video directly on picture)
• GIF picture animations supported
• 4 new sound effect tracks.
• Added 25 frames per second for exporting.
• 1080P high quality exporting supported.
• Bug fixes.

• Rearranging tracks is supported now. (Press and hold on a track, then you can move it.)
• 720P exporting is back.
• Fixed the black screen problem on iPhone 4.
• Other bug fixes.

• Improved iOS 10 compatibility.
• Bug fixes.
• Fixed YouTube uploading problem.

• Fixed YouTube uploading login error.
• Fixed Facebook uploading problem.
• Improved iPhone X compatibility.

• 60 fps exporting supported.
• movie editing performance improved.
• Fixed a crash bug.

• Fixed YouTube uploading error.
• Changed Facebook uploading process.
• Some bug fixes.

• Fixed YouTube uploading error.
• Changed Facebook uploading process.
• Some bug fixes.
